frontmatter.title: Book Review: Little Bets – How Breakthrough Ideas Emerge from Small Discoveries
frontmatter.short: Good ideas rarely emerge fully formed; rather they evolve in a discursive and unpredictable fashion.  ‘Little Bets’ advises on the value of taking small exploratory steps from which, as the book’s subtitle has it, breakthrough ideas emerge.
frontmatter.keywords: business intelligence reporting, data driven decision making, data driven decisions, using data to make decisions
